channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Russia advances in Ukraine as Putin meets Xi in China
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, emboldened by the survival of his wartime economy and Russia's advances in Ukraine. Follow for live updates

item.title: Slovakia's prime minister expected to survive after shooting
item.description: Slovakian Prime Minister Robert Fico is expected to survive after being shot five times in what officials described as a politically motivated assassination attempt.

item.title: May 15, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced $2 billion in military financing for Ukraine as Russia is pushing into northeastern part of the country.

item.title: May 14, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Antony Blinken met with Volodymyr Zelensky in Kyiv earlier Tuesday, where the Ukrainian president told the US secretary of state that Ukraine urgently needs more air defenses.

item.title: If you think you can't focus for long, you're right
item.description: Your attention span has shrunk by nearly two minutes in the past 20 years, driven in part by technology's hold over your work and home life, experts say. Here's how to stay focused so you can get things done.

item.title: May 14, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Amid signs that Israel may launch a full-scale incursion in Rafah, aid agencies are warning any escalation in the southern Gaza city risks exacerbating the already deteriorating humanitarian situation.

item.title: Trump defense cross-examines Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's defense will continue to cross-examine Michael Cohen on Thursday as it aims to discredit the prosecution's key witness in the former president's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: May 13, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration has assessed that Israel has amassed enough troops on the edge of Rafah to move forward with a full-scale incursion in the coming days, but senior US officials are currently unsure if Israel has made a final decision to carry out such a move.

item.title: Michael Cohen testifies in Trump hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's ex-attorney Michael Cohen is testifying Monday in the former president's criminal hush money trial in New York. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: May 11, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel's military has ordered the evacuation of more neighborhoods in Rafah ahead of a potential major ground operation in the southern Gaza city, where over 1 million Palestinians are estimated to be displaced.

item.title: May 12, 2024 - Israel-Gaza updates
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people have fled Rafah after the Israel Defense Forces ordered evacuations ahead of a ground offensive.

item.title: The latest on the massive solar storm
item.description: A stunning aurora, caused by a severe geomagnetic storm, is painting the sky shades of pink, purple and green as it spreads into locations it rarely reaches Friday night.

item.title: May 10, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration said Friday it is "reasonable to assess" that US weapons have been used by Israeli forces in Gaza in ways that are inconsistent with international humanitarian law â€” but the highly anticipated report stopped short of officially saying Israel violated the law.

item.title: Michael Cohen set to testify at Trump hush money trial Monday
item.description: Donald Trump's historic criminal hush money trial has wrapped up for the day. His former attorney Michael Cohen is expected to begin his testimony on Monday.

item.title: May 9, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said US President Joe Biden made a mistake after the US paused sending a shipment of bombs to Israel so that they would not used in an invasion of the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Stormy Daniels wraps up testimony in Trump hush money trial
item.description: The testimony of adult film actress Stormy Daniels, a central figure in the criminal case against Donald Trump, wrapped on Thursday after the former president's lawyers continued their attack on her credibility.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
2 men charged in connection with the fatal shooting of a 1-year-old boy in New York
item.description: Dashawn Austin and Akeem Artis were two of 18 charged in a 63-count indictment for gang-related activity including multiple counts of murder and weapons charges.

item.title: May 8, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: US President Joe Biden told CNN on Wednesday he would halt some shipments of American weapons to Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered a major invasion of the city of Rafah.

item.title: House kills motion to vacate Johnson from speakership
item.description: The House on Wednesday rejected an effort by GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene to oust Speaker Mike Johnson.

item.title: Congress grills liberal cities' school districts over antisemitism
item.description: Colleges and universities held graduation ceremonies over the weekend as pro-Palestinian protests continued on campuses across the US. Follow for live updates

item.title: May 7, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli airstrikes killed multiple people in Rafah early Tuesday, Palestinian officials said,

item.title: Stormy Daniels testifies in Trump's hush money trial
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's hush money trial continued Tuesday in New York.

item.title: Deadly tornado reported in Oklahoma after barrage of destructive storms
item.description: Destructive storms and tornadoes hit the Central US on Monday and Tuesday, including at least one deadly tornado.

item.title: May 6, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli airstrikes killed multiple people in Rafah early Tuesday, Palestinian officials said.

item.title: The Met Gala 2024
item.description: The Met Gala, an annual, invitation-only event, was held Monday night in New York City.

item.title: Witness testimony in Trump's hush money trial wraps for the day
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's hush money trial continues in New York. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Met Gala 2024: Updates from the red carpet
item.description: The annual, invitation only-event to raise money for the Metropolitan Museum of Art's Costume Institute is taking place today in New York City. Follow for live updates.

item.title: May 5, 2024 - US campus protests
item.description: Colleges and universities are holding graduation ceremonies as pro-Palestinian protests continue on campuses across the US.

item.title: Protests against Israel's war in Gaza rattle colleges across the US
item.description: Colleges and universities held graduation ceremonies this weekend as pro-Palestinian protests continued on campuses across the US. Follow for live updates.
